verses.verse: And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3568>Cush<s%> [were] <S%H5434>Seba,<s%> <S%H2341>Havilah,<s%> <S%H5454>Sabta,<s%> <S%H7484>Raama,<s%> and <S%H5455>Sabteca;<s%> and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7484>Raamah<s%> [were] <S%H7614>Sheba<s%> and <S%H1719>Dedan.<s%>
And <S%H3568>Cush<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H5248>Nimrod;<s%> he <S%H2490>began<s%> to be a <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H1368>one<s%> in the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
And <S%H775>Arpachshad<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H7974>Shelah<s%> and <S%H7974>Shelah<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H5677>Eber.<s%>

And <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> were <S%H3205>born<s%> to <S%H5677>Eber,<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H259>one<s%> was <S%H6389>Peleg,<s%> for in his <S%H3117>days<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> was <S%H6385>divided,<s%> and his brother's <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H3355>Joktan.<s%>
<S%H428>These<s%> are their <S%H8435>genealogies:<s%> the first-born of <S%H3458>Ishmael<s%> [was] <S%H5032>Nebaioth,<s%> then <S%H6938>Kedar,<s%> <S%H110>Adbeel,<s%> <S%H4017>Mibsam,<s%>

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6989>Keturah,<s%> Abraham's <S%H6370>concubine,<s%> [whom] she <S%H3205>bore,<s%> [were] <S%H2175>Zimran,<s%> <S%H3370>Jokshan,<s%> <S%H4091>Medan,<s%> <S%H4080>Midian,<s%> <S%H3435>Ishbak,<s%> and <S%H7774>Shuah.<s%> And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3370>Jokshan<s%> [were] <S%H7614>Sheba<s%> and <S%H1719>Dedan.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian<s%> [were] <S%H5891>Ephah,<s%> <S%H6081>Epher,<s%> <S%H2585>Hanoch,<s%> <S%H28>Abida,<s%> and <S%H420>Eldaah.<s%> <S%H3605>All<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> were the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6989>Keturah.<s%>
And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H3205>became<s%> the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H3327>Isaac.<s%> The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> [were] <S%H6215>Esau<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3877>Lotan<s%> [were] <S%H2752>Hori<s%> and <S%H1950>Homam;<s%> and Lotan's <S%H269>sister<s%> [was] <S%H8555>Timna.<s%>

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7732>Shobal<s%> [were] <S%H5935>Alian,<s%> <S%H4506>Manahath,<s%> <S%H5858>Ebal,<s%> <S%H8195>Shephi,<s%> and <S%H208>Onam.<s%> And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6649>Zibeon<s%> [were] <S%H345>Aiah<s%> and <S%H6034>Anah.<s%>

The <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6034>Anah<s%> [was] <S%H1787>Dishon.<s%> And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1787>Dishon<s%> [were] <S%H2566>Hamran,<s%> <S%H790>Eshban,<s%> <S%H3506>Ithran,<s%> and <S%H3763>Cheran.<s%>

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H687>Ezer<s%> [were] <S%H1092>Bilhan,<s%> <S%H2190>Zaavan<s%> and <S%H3292>Jaakan.<s%> The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1789>Dishan<s%> [were] <S%H5780>Uz<s%> and <S%H765>Aran.<s%>

Now <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H4428>kings<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H9000>Edom<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> any <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H4427>reigned.<s%> <S%H1106>Bela<s%> [was] the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1160>Beor,<s%> and the <S%H8034>name<s%> of his <S%H5892>city<s%> was <S%H1838>Dinhabah.<s%>
When <S%H1106>Bela<s%> <S%H4191>died,<s%> <S%H3103>Jobab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2226>Zerah<s%> of <S%H1224>Bozrah<s%> <S%H4427>became<s%> <S%H4427>king<s%> in his <S%H8478>place.<s%>
When <S%H3103>Jobab<s%> <S%H4191>died,<s%> <S%H2367>Husham<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H8489>Temanites<s%> <S%H4427>became<s%> <S%H4427>king<s%> in his <S%H8478>place.<s%>

When <S%H2367>Husham<s%> <S%H4191>died,<s%> <S%H1908>Hadad<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H911>Bedad,<s%> who <S%H5221>defeated<s%> <S%H4080>Midian<s%> in the <S%H7704>field<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> <S%H4427>became<s%> <S%H4427>king<s%> in his <S%H8478>place;<s%> and the <S%H8034>name<s%> of his <S%H5892>city<s%> [was] <S%H5762>Avith.<s%>
When <S%H8072>Samlah<s%> <S%H4191>died,<s%> <S%H7586>Shaul<s%> of <S%H7344>Rehoboth<s%> by the <S%H5104>River<s%> <S%H4427>became<s%> <S%H4427>king<s%> in his <S%H8478>place.<s%>
When <S%H7586>Shaul<s%> <S%H4191>died,<s%> Baal-hanan the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5907>Achbor<s%> <S%H4427>became<s%> <S%H4427>king<s%> in his <S%H8478>place.<s%>

When Baal-hanan <S%H4191>died,<s%> <S%H1908>Hadad<s%> <S%H4427>became<s%> <S%H4427>king<s%> in his <S%H8478>place;<s%> and the <S%H8034>name<s%> of his <S%H5892>city<s%> was <S%H6464>Pai,<s%> and his wife's <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H4105>Mehetabel,<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H4308>Matred,<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H4314>Mezahab.<s%>
